Actions.Name: Yes Boss
Effects: The acting [name] may rush 2 before this attack.
All other characters standing adjacent to one or more [name]s take 2 damage.

Actions.Name: You got it Boss
Actions.Description: Up to two [name]s can rush 1, then daze an adjacent foe. Dazed foes take 4 damage instead.

Actions.Name: Fill Em with Daylight
Actions.Description: A foe in range 4 of any [name] takes 3 piercing damage, once, per [name] in range 4. This damage cannot reduce a foe past 1 hp.
